name: Recruitment in Engineering and Geoscience Disciplines at E1 Level through GATE 2025

details.vacancies: Positions in Engineering and Geoscience disciplines

eligibility.requirement: Candidates with valid GATE 2025 scores in relevant subjects

details.application_process: Candidates are required to appear for GATE 2025 in the relevant subjects. The detailed application process will be available on the ONGC website after the declaration of GATE 2025 results.
